name: Barcode API
description: Generate Barcode images for a given barcode number. You can decode Barcode images and get the barcodes in a numberic form as well. Many industry standard barcode types are supported. The best and complete Barcode API on the cloud. [Click here to subscribe](http://fungenerators.com/api/barcode/)
